name: Snatcher CD-ROMantic: Pilot Disk
overview: It contains a playable demo of the first scene in Snatcher, with no actual differences with the final release. It also has a trailer [full version] of the game, character bios with voice over, an interview with part of the staff, and 3 excellent tracks in CD format, accessible as a Metal Gear jukebox (These are One Night In Neo Kobe, Tears Stained Eyes and Pressure of Tension).
